description.plain:
Atlas Genius is a South Australian rock band consisting of guitarist and vocalist Keith Jeffery, drummer Michael Jeffery, bassist Steven Jeffery, and keyboardist Darren Sell. The band released their debut album When It Was Now in 2013, which featured the songs “Trojans” and “If So”. Both songs reached the top 10 of the Billboard Alternative Songs chart.

In 2015, the band released its sophomore album, Inanimate Objects.

body.plain:
Atlas Genius is a South Australian rock band consisting of guitarist and vocalist Keith Jeffery, drummer Michael Jeffery, bassist Steven Jeffery, and keyboardist Darren Sell. The band released their debut album When It Was Now in 2013, which featured the songs “Trojans” and “If So”. Both songs reached the top 10 of the Billboard Alternative Songs chart.

In 2015, the band released its sophomore album, Inanimate Objects.

songs.title: Trojans

description.plain:
Trojans is the first single from the South Australian Atlas Genius, who emerged in August 2012 with an EP entitled Through the Glass. Peaking at number 4 on the US Alternative charts, the song garnered quite a bit of attention, and was even once released for free as a weekly iTunes promotion, garnering the group some well-deserved attention.



The song details the thoughts of a brokenhearted lover who, despite attempts to stay guarded, struggles not to reminisce.

songs.embed_content: Read “Trojans” by Atlas Genius on Genius

Trojans is the first single from the South Australian Atlas Genius, who emerged in August 2012 with an EP entitled Through the Glass. Peaking at number 4 on the US Alternative charts, the song garnered quite a bit of attention, and was even once released for free as a weekly iTunes promotion, garnering the group some well-deserved attention.



The song details the thoughts of a brokenhearted lover who, despite attempts to stay guarded, struggles not to reminisce.

songs.full_title: Trojans (Xaphoon Jones Remix) by Atlas Genius
songs.title: Trojans (Xaphoon Jones Remix)

songs.lyrics:
16 ContributorsTrojans Lyrics[Verse 1]
Take it off, take it in
Take off all the thoughts of what we've been
Take a look, hesitate
Take a picture you could never recreate
Write a song, make a note
For the lump that sits inside your throat
Change the locks, change the scene
Change it all, but can't change what we've been

[Chorus]
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Your Trojan's in my head

[Verse 2]
It's okay if it's gone
The thoughts that you had that it was the one
And, oh, what is left?
For all those times, is that what you get?
Oh, regardless
The walls get painted anyway
Oh, you're guarding
The gates, but it all got away
You might also like[Chorus]
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head

[Bridge]
Your Trojan's in my head
Your Trojan's in my head
Your Trojan's in my head
Your Trojan's in my head

[Verse 3]
Take it off, take it in
Take off all the thoughts of what we've been
Take a look, hesitate
Take a picture you could never recreate
Write a song, make a note
For the lump that sits inside your throat
Change the locks, change the scene
Change it all, but can't change what we've been

[Chorus]
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my—
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Oh, oh
Your Trojan's in my head
Your Trojan's in my head
[Outro]
Take it off, take it in
All the thoughts of what we've been
Take off all the thoughts of what we've been19Embed

songs.title: Molecules
songs.embed_content: Read “Molecules” by Atlas Genius on Genius
songs.lyrics:
12 ContributorsMolecules Lyrics[Verse 1]
We steal the molecules from the dead
We liberate inanimate objects
Is this a path of will up ahead?
Or are we just destined to get what we get?

[Pre-Chorus]
Drawn to your face like never before
Even the mistakes aren't really mistakes at all

[Chorus]
I wanna confess that you own me
And we don't rest if we're lonely
There's innocence in the moment
Maybe now's the time to be alive

[Verse 2]
We steal the molecules from the dead
We liberate inanimate objects
Is this a sign of will in our heads?
Or are we predestined to get what we get?

[Pre-Chorus]
Drawn to your face like never before
Even the mistakes aren't really mistakes at all
You might also like[Chorus]
I wanna confess that you own me (that you own me)
And we don't rest if we're lonely (if we're lonely)
There's innocence in the moment
Maybe now's the time to be alive

[Bridge]
We've been dressed as humans
We've been kings and homeless
Still, we're just fragments of a great collide
(Great collide, great collide...)

[Chorus]
I wanna confess that you own me
And we don't rest if we're lonely
There's innocence in the moment
Maybe now's the time to be alive

I wanna confess that you own me (that you own me)
And we don't rest if we're lonely (if we're lonely)
There's innocence in the moment (in the moment)
Maybe now's the time to be alive
Maybe now's the time to be alive5Embed

songs.title: Stockholm

description.plain: “Stockholm” is the third song off Atlas Genius' second album, Inanimate Objects. The titular city is never mentioned in the song, but likely inspired the song’s content (“Saw a mountain”).

songs.embed_content: Read “Stockholm” by Atlas Genius on Genius

body.plain: “Stockholm” is the third song off Atlas Genius' second album, Inanimate Objects. The titular city is never mentioned in the song, but likely inspired the song’s content (“Saw a mountain”).

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsStockholm Lyrics[Verse 1]
Won a moment, lost a bet
Saw a mountain, went to bed
Paid a ransom for a ghost
For the thing I want the most
So I left to find a home
For a place to call my own

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Even if you think we're not
We're close to close enough
It's an end to end the start
[Chorus]
We're moving from the ground floor
Rising tide
Push us up more
How we climb
As the water's pouring in
Like it always should have been
We can crawl or we can run
Towards the sun

[Verse 2]
Take it all, I'll keep the rest
Burn the wheels and pound your chest
You might also like[Pre-Chorus 2]
In the days before the cold
All the houses oversold
It's an end to end the start

[Chorus]
We're moving from the ground floor
Rising tide
Push us up more
How we climb
As the water's pouring in
Like it always should have been
We can crawl or we can run
Towards the sun
And although we've just begun
We keep going till we've won
We can crawl or we can run
Towards the sun1Embed
